abstract.t: The Advanced Streaming Format (ASF) is an extensible file formatdesigned to store synchronized multimedia data. It supports datadelivery over a wide variety of networks and protocols while stillproving suitable for local playback. ASF supports advanced multimediacapabilities including extensible media types, component download,scaleable media types, author-specified stream prioritization, multiplelanguage support, and extensive bibliographic capabilities, includingdocument and content management.
